name: Scottish Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Association
memberOrga: Link to SHFCA member directory webpage: http://www.shfca.org.uk/member-directory-1
goal:
The Scottish Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Association (SHFCA) promotes and develops Scottish expertise in fuel cells and hydrogen technologies.

SHFCA brings together Scotlandâ€™s specialised fuel cell companies, power generation companies, academic institutions, research and development bodies, energy consultants, Scottish Enterprise and local enterprise companies and councils with an interest in Hydrogen & Fuel Cells.

SHFCA membership is open to all-comers, and includes a significant number of members throughout Europe and internationally.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
The deployment of hydrogen and fuel cell technologies supports the deployment of low carbon energy and transport technologies, reducing the threat of damaging climate change.
SHFCA follows policies on environment, energy, and transport. SHFCA also has a focus on safety and wellbeing.
